IX.iii.2.A.7.a
.
Nursing Facility/
Medicaid
Beneficiaries Without Dependents Receiving $90 or Less
When monthly benefits are $90 or less for nursing facility/Medicaid beneficiaries who would otherwise be subject to the $90 limit per
38 CFR 3.551(i)
, an adjustment for nursing facility/Medicaid status does not apply.Â  However, if monthly benefits become greater than $90 through retroactive increase, the $90 limit for nursing facility/Medicaid status does apply.
